examples: I heard the tiny squeak of a mouse in the walls.
I hear the sound of seagulls near the sea.
To hear both sides of the argument.
The Supreme Court heard the case on Tuesday.
Have you heard the news?
words.defineEn: to notice the sound a person or thing is making
words.defineVi: để ý đến âm thanh mà một người hoặc vật đang tạo ra

examples: listen to our problems.
Listen Jane.
I listened carefully to her story.
Don’t listen to Jerry.
Don't listen to him.
words.defineEn: to give our attention to the sound a person or thing is making
words.defineVi: để cung cấp cho sự chú ý của chúng tôi đến âm thanh một người hoặc điều đang làm

examples: See full dictionary entry for heart.
See my car?
This stadium has seen many thrilling football games.
The twentieth century saw dramatic changes in most areas of life.
Our car has seen better days!
words.defineEn: to notice a thing or person with our eyes
words.defineVi: để ý một điều hoặc người với đôi mắt của chúng tôi

examples: The girls looked so pretty in their summer dresses.
The food looks good.
The garden looks nice.
Her father looked unhappy.
The house looks east.
words.defineEn: to turn our eyes toward a person or thing that we want to see
words.defineVi: để hướng mắt về phía một người hoặc vật mà chúng ta muốn nhìn thấy

examples: Watch your mouth!
The girls watched the development of this relationship with incredulity.
A large crowd watched the game on Saturday.
Watch your head on the low ceiling.
Watch me!
words.defineEn: to look at a thing or person and pay attention to it for some time
words.defineVi: để nhìn vào một điều hoặc người và chú ý đến nó trong một thời gian

examples: She gently touched the soft fur of the cat.
A regular newsletter keeps people in touch with local events.
My parents were constantly in touch.
The Rangpur slices added a vibrant touch to my summer fruit salad.
The leather sofa adds a touch of elegance to the room.
words.defineEn: to put our hand or body part on a thing or person
words.defineVi: để đặt bàn tay hoặc bộ phận cơ thể của chúng tôi trên một điều hoặc người

examples: Many more businesses are feeling the chill wind of the recession.
He felt the weight of the heavy burden on his shoulders.
She felt a sharp pain in her hand.
We all felt the force of her arguments.
The wool feels soft.
words.defineEn: to experience or be aware of an emotion
words.defineVi: để trải nghiệm hoặc nhận thức được một cảm xúc

examples: My wife talked sense into me.
Your friend really talks a blue streak!
The two men talked.
A true leader walks the talk.
He talked a blue streak all through breakfast.
words.defineEn: to tell someone about the information, feelings, or ideas that we have
words.defineVi: để nói với ai đó về thông tin, cảm xúc hoặc ý tưởng mà chúng tôi có

examples: The hole calls the thief.
The organization called the new regulations a turning point in the campaign against smoking.
To call a meeting/strike.
A classic hot chocolate recipe calls for scalded milk to be mixed with cocoa powder and sugar.
You call that mercy?
words.defineEn: to telephone a place or person
words.defineVi: gọi điện thoại cho một địa điểm hoặc một người

examples: Over seven hundred Facebook users have already liked the company’s website.
He likes the comfortable seats and big screen at the movie theater.
By the next morning, over twenty of my friends had liked my new profile picture.
Like the commandments written in stone.
Such helps were like drop in the ocean.
words.defineEn: to feel that someone or something is good, enjoyable, or interesting
words.defineVi: để cảm thấy rằng một ai đó hoặc một cái gì đó là tốt, thú vị, hoặc thú vị

examples: After all, love will find a way.
He loved gardening.
They loved the sun-dried tomato and mozzarella-filled pansotti.
I love the vibrant green color of Granny Smith apples.
I love the crunch of romaine lettuce in my sandwiches.
words.defineEn: to have very strong feelings for someone or something that is important to us and we like a lot and want to take care of
words.defineVi: có tình cảm rất mãnh liệt với ai đó hoặc điều gì đó quan trọng đối với chúng ta và chúng ta rất thích và muốn chăm sóc

examples: That guy really hates my guts.
I hate shopping.
Everybody hates the sight of you.
I hate summer vacation.
Before all this, I just hated the sight of him.
words.defineEn: to really not like something or someone
words.defineVi: để thực sự không thích một cái gì đó hoặc một ai đó

examples: The professor knew his subject from the ground up.
I know my stuff.
I know this town like the back of my hand.
No one knows the answer.
She knows the score.
words.defineEn: to have some type of information about something or to be aware of something
words.defineVi: để có một số loại thông tin về một cái gì đó hoặc để nhận thức được một cái gì đó

examples: To learn a language/skill/trade.
High time you learned a thing or two.
He learned about the different departments within the police organization.
She learns about the laws of physics and the properties of matter in her science lessons.
I learned about different breeds of cows and their characteristics.
words.defineEn: to gain knowledge of or skill in something by experience, by study, or by being taught
words.defineVi: để đạt được kiến thức hoặc kỹ năng trong một cái gì đó bằng kinh nghiệm, nghiên cứu, hoặc bằng cách được dạy

examples: The interviewer asked me a series of questions during the job interview.
Better ask teacher about.
Can I ask a favour of you?
Can I ask a question?
Did you ask the price?
words.defineEn: to use words in a question form or tone to get answers from someone
words.defineVi: để sử dụng các từ trong một hình thức câu hỏi hoặc giai điệu để có được câu trả lời từ một ai đó

examples: My friend studied the nutritional benefits of different legumes for her research project.
We study the history of our country in social studies class.
She studied different subjects in school, from math to history.
We study different subjects like math, science, and English at school.
Researchers study diatoms to better understand the environmental conditions of aquatic habitats.
words.defineEn: to spend time to learn about certain subjects by reading books, going to school, etc.
words.defineVi: dành thời gian để tìm hiểu về các chủ đề nhất định bằng cách đọc sách, đi học, v.v.

examples: That will teach them a lesson!
My brother taught me the best way to cook spuds over the campfire.
She teaches yoga to promote health and well-being.
My sister is teaching her dog to sit and stay.
He taught himself to play the violin.
words.defineEn: to instruct or educate someone; to give lessons to students in a university, college, school, etc.
words.defineVi: để hướng dẫn hoặc giáo dục ai đó; để giảng bài cho sinh viên trong một trường đại học, cao đẳng, trường học, v.v.

examples: The soup needs a little more seasoning.
This shirt needs washing.
My father's car needs an oil change.
I need a lightweight sweater for the spring season.
We need a new brush for our pet's fur.
words.defineEn: to want something or someone that we must have if we want to do or be something
words.defineVi: muốn một cái gì đó hoặc một ai đó mà chúng ta phải có nếu chúng ta muốn làm hoặc trở thành một cái gì đó

examples: you want a knuckle sandwich?
We want a deal.
I want a new job.
To want children/kids.
I want a dish of creamy mushroom bucatini with Parmesan right now.
words.defineEn: to wish to do or have something
words.defineVi: muốn làm hoặc có một cái gì đó

examples: Both drivers shared the blame for the accident.
My friend shared a bag of chocolate-covered macadamia nuts with us.
The locals generously shared their knowledge of manioc processing techniques.
All members of the band equally share the band's profits.
The HR department only shared the employee's personal information on a need-to-know basis.
words.defineEn: to have or use something with someone else at the same time
words.defineVi: để có hoặc sử dụng một cái gì đó với người khác cùng một lúc

examples: Put your name here.
Our company puts the emphasis on quality.
Election season always puts my dad's back up.
This job puts years on you.
Put your clothes in the cupboard.
words.defineEn: to move someone or something into a place and let them be there
words.defineVi: để di chuyển một ai đó hoặc một cái gì đó vào một nơi và để họ ở đó

examples: The chef prepared a creamy tomato soup for lunch.
The chef prepared a tasty fish stew with vegetables and spices.
The chef prepared a roast beef and horseradish omelette.
My friend Prepared a nourishing soup with cellophane noodles, mushrooms, and bok choy.
She prepared a creamy navy bean and vegetable stew for his children.
words.defineEn: to make a person or thing ready for doing something
words.defineVi: để làm cho một người hoặc điều sẵn sàng để làm một cái gì đó

examples: I planned a surprise party for my little sister's birthday.
She planned a romantic candlelit meal for their anniversary.
They are planning a movie night at the movie theater with their family.
The plan ran into a brick wall.
The closing of the airport knocked our holiday plans on the head.
words.defineEn: to decide on the details of a future activity or event
words.defineVi: để quyết định về các chi tiết của một hoạt động hoặc sự kiện trong tương lai

examples: She explained the rules of the game to the new players.
Can you explain this math concept to me?
They explained the procedure for submitting the application form.
They explained the process of making a paper airplane step by step.
He explained the plot of the movie to his friend who hadn't seen it.
words.defineEn: to make something clear and easy to understand by giving more information about it
words.defineVi: để làm cho một cái gì đó rõ ràng và dễ hiểu bằng cách cung cấp thêm thông tin về nó

examples: The aromatic spice fills the kitchen with a delightful scent.
The delicate aroma of ripe may apples fills the kitchen.
The kitchen was filled with the smell of garlic.
The classroom is filled with desks, chairs, and a chalkboard.
The child's room was filled with colorful toys.
words.defineEn: to make something full
words.defineVi: để làm cho một cái gì đó đầy đủ

examples: The colorful bird flew high in the sky.
"And pigs can fly!"
The airplane flew through the clouds on its way to the destination.
a black raven is flying across the night sky.
Birds can fly freely in the sky.
words.defineEn: to move or travel through the air
words.defineVi: để di chuyển hoặc đi du lịch trong không khí

examples: 95 per cent of the UK can now get superfast broadband.
This room gets very little sunshine.
Get a load of that dress Mag!
Get a load of George over there.
The police got wind of the illegal drug deal.
words.defineEn: to reach or to make oneself reach a specific condition or state
words.defineVi: để đạt được hoặc để làm cho bản thân đạt được một điều kiện hoặc trạng thái cụ thể

examples: The unexpected challenges became grist for the mill of their problem-solving skills.
Short hair really becomes you.
The child will become an adult.
The new office block has become an expensive white elephant.
The old government program has become a sacred cow.
words.defineEn: to start or grow to be
words.defineVi: để bắt đầu hoặc phát triển để được
